name: Questions and Answers
description: This is a simple Q&A app that allows users to create questionaires and answer them. (made for a friend's project)

name: E-commerce App UI
description: This is a simple e-commerce app UI that allows users to view marketing metrics and orders.

name: Tomoseg
description: This is DICOM drive app that allows users to upload CT scans. (Work in progress)

name: Monkeyplayin' API
description: This is an API for a tensorflow recommenders model trained on game recommendation data from Kaggle. Works slow because it's hosted on a free tier server. Try recommend/?genre=[%27Shooter%27] to get recommendations. (school project)

name: Geobrowser
description: This is proprietary software for GMV. It's a web-based geospatial data visualization tool.
